metadata.name: THE ETERNAL CONFLICT
metadata.description:
In a world of light and dark  
Where good and evil leave their mark  
Forces clash in endless fight  
Each determined to claim the night  
On one side stands the righteous throng  
On the other side, the darkness looms  
With hearts full of love and spirits strong  
With its twisted heart and its evil fumes  
They fight for peace and all that's right  
It seeks to shroud the world in pain  
To hold back the darkness and the endless night  
To reign supreme and forever reign.
